titleStmt.title: The Christians journall shewing both the course to be held, and the way to be shund by all those, who desire (as they ought) to enter into life : in three sermons vpon Matthew 7.13.14 / by Samuel Hieron.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston for Thomas Man,
